Posts.Content: Hi Rich, I to do not use make up I have not yet got to the hair loss stage, it will be in about 4 weeks as I start chemo soon. I have been on line and you can buy "stick on "  real hair eyebrows that you can re use ! there are instructions on how to apply them, and eye lashes are available in boots etc alsorts of shapes and sizes. I am sure there are lots of people out there who have more info for you. Keep your mums spirits up good luck.
Posts.Title: Advice for my Mum

Posts.Content: Thanks Ellen, I'll be asking about it tomorrow too.
Posts.Title: Advice for my Mum

Posts.Content: My sister in law sent me some, i don't like honey but every one is so for it so i will start taking it in drinks and see how I go any port in a storm !!
